advancements.mob_mementos.creeper_belt.d: Keep wearing the belt and no block explodes.
advancements.mob_mementos.enderman_ankle: Convince an Enderman to stop a senseless life of vandalism.
advancements.mob_mementos.endermite_scal: Gently collect a scale from an Endermite.
Cloak yourself in phantom membrane to hide from nocturnal vultures.
advancements.mob_mementos.root.descripti: Discover the power of Mob Mementos.
advancements.mob_mementos.root.title: Mob Mementos
advancements.mob_mementos.silverfish_sca: Politely ask a Silverfish for one of its scales.
config.mob_mementos.conduit_necklace.dam: How often (in ticks) the memento deals damage to nearby hostile aquatic mobs.
How much damage the memento deals to nearby hostile aquatic mobs each interval. 1 = half a heart.
config.mob_mementos.conduit_necklace.dur: How many times the memento can deal damage before breaking. Set to 0 for infinite durability.
config.mob_mementos.conduit_necklace.ena: Whether the Conduit Necklace is enabled.
config.mob_mementos.conduit_necklace.rad: The radius around the wearer in which hostile aquatic mobs will be damaged.
config.mob_mementos.creeper_belt.check_i: How often (in ticks) the memento checks for creepers nearby.
config.mob_mementos.creeper_belt.durabil: How many creepers the memento can protect against before breaking. Set to 0 for infinite durability.
config.mob_mementos.creeper_belt.enabled: Whether the Creeper Belt is enabled.
config.mob_mementos.creeper_belt.radius: The radius around the wearer in which creepers will not deal block damage when they explode.
config.mob_mementos.enderman_anklet.chec: How often (in ticks) the memento checks for endermen nearby.
config.mob_mementos.enderman_anklet.dura: How many endermen the memento can protect against before breaking. Set to 0 for infinite durability.
config.mob_mementos.enderman_anklet.enab: Whether the Enderman Anklet is enabled.
config.mob_mementos.enderman_anklet.radi: The radius around the wearer in which endermen will be prevented from picking up or placing blocks.
config.mob_mementos.phantom_cloak.durabi: How many Phantom swoops can be blocked before the memento breaks. Set to 0 for infinite durability.
config.mob_mementos.phantom_cloak.enable: Whether the Phantom Cloak is enabled.
config.mob_mementos.silverfish_bangle.ch: How often (in ticks) the memento checks for infested blocks nearby.
config.mob_mementos.silverfish_bangle.du: How many blocks the memento can convert before breaking. Set to 0 for infinite durability.
config.mob_mementos.silverfish_bangle.en: Whether the Silverfish Bangle is enabled.
config.mob_mementos.silverfish_bangle.ra: The radius around the wearer in which infested blocks will be converted.
